node.text:
Dive into Van Cleef & Arpels' workshops and listen to the Maison's Mains d'Or share their unique savoir-faire.
 
"When working with gold, it is important to respect the curves outlined by the designer." Admire the succession of exacting gestures performed by the jeweler on the Bouton d'or ballerina clip.
 
Discover more about Van Cleef & Arpels craftsmen's expertise and the Bouton d'or collection in the Maison's IGTV channel.
 
#VCAboutondor #VanCleefArpels #VCAturquoise #VCAyellowgold #VCAlapislazuli #VCAdance #VCACraftsmanship #Craftsmanship

node.text:
Dive into Van Cleef & Arpels' workshops and listen to the Maison's Mains d'Or share their unique savoir-faire.
 
"When I look at the finished piece, I feel proud of my work because this type of jewel is one of the kind."
Follow the meticulous steps of Van Cleef & Arpels' polisher hidden behind the Bouton d'or ballerina clip.
 
Discover more about Van Cleef & Arpels craftsmen's expertise and the Bouton d'or collection in the Maison's IGTV channel.
 
#VCAboutondor #VanCleefArpels #VCAturquoise #VCAyellowgold #VCAlapislazuli #VCAdance #VCACraftsmanship #Craftsmanship

node.text:
Dive into Van Cleef & Arpels' workshops and listen to the Maison's Mains d'Or share their unique savoir-faire.
 
"Selecting the raw stones that will serve to carve out the caps is the lapidary's foremost challenge."
Meet Constance, expert colored stone buyer of the Maison, and explore the challenges faced when selecting the ornamental stones for the Bouton d'or ballerina clip.
 
Discover more about Van Cleef & Arpels craftsmen's expertise and the Bouton d'or collection in the Maison's IGTV channel.
 
#VCAboutondor #VanCleefArpels #VCAturquoise #VCAyellowgold #VCAlapislazuli #VCAdance #VCACraftsmanship #Craftsmanship

node.text:
“Dance brings all the artistic disciplines together … it is a fascinating art form and an incredible field of expression.” Serge Laurent, Van Cleef & Arpels' Dance and Cultural Program Manager.

Devotee of dance ever since its origins, Van Cleef & Arpels aims to promote the choreographic heritage, encourage contemporary creation and raise the profile of this artistic universe among the public at large.

Listen to Nicolas Bos, CEO of Van Cleef & Arpels and Serge Laurent, to learn more about the Dance Reflections initiative.
#VCADanceReflections #VCAdance #VanCleefArpels

node.title: Dance Reflections by Van Cleef & Arpels

node.text:
Sound on!
Since its foundation in 1906, Van Cleef & Arpels has always had a constant fascination with depicting the sky and stars. Listen to our video podcast and dive into the High Jewelry collection Sous les étoiles, at the crossroads of reality and abstraction...
 
#VCASouslesEtoiles #HighJewelry #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
Van Cleef & Arpels has collaborated with astrophysicist Isabelle Grenier, to bring a scientific dimension to the Sous les étoiles collection.
 
Watch this IGTV to learn more about this collaboration, that brought forth a High Jewelry collection tinged with dreams.
 
#VCASouslesEtoiles #HighJewelry #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
The depictions offered over the centuries by enthralled astronomers, writers and artists have fuelled the imagination of the Maison’s designers, expert gemologists and craftsmen to create the collection Sous les étoiles.
 
Watch the IGTV and explore the Sous les étoiles High Jewelry collection introduced by Nicolas Bos, CEO and Artistic Director of the Maison.
 
#VCASouslesEtoiles #HighJewelry #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
Did you ever wonder how Van Cleef & Arpels' creations are crafted, and by whom?
 
Filmmaker @loicprigent invites you into Van Cleef & Arpels' workshops to introduce you to the Mains d'Or, the craftsmen who work together to give birth to Van Cleef & Arpels' wonders.
 
"When I was little, I was obsessed by it. The only job I wanted to do when I'd grow up was polisher."
 
Discover more about the talent of a polisher at Van Cleef & Arpels, and listen to one of the Maison's craftsmen share this unique savoir-faire.
 
#VCAHighJewelry #VCAtogether #VCAsavoirfaire #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
Did you ever wonder how Van Cleef & Arpels' creations are crafted, and by whom?

Filmmaker @loicprigent invites you into Van Cleef & Arpels' workshops to introduce you to the Mains d'Or, the craftsmen who work together to give birth to Van Cleef & Arpels' wonders.

 "Each stone-setter has his own technique, because we all learned in a different way."

Discover more about the talent of a Gem setter at Van Cleef & Arpels, and listen to one of the Maison's craftsmen share this unique savoir-faire.

#VCAHighJewelry #VCAtogether #VCAsavoirfaire #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
Did you ever wonder how Van Cleef & Arpels' creations are crafted, and by whom?
 
Filmmaker @loicprigent invites you into Van Cleef & Arpels' workshops to introduce you to the Mains d'Or, the craftsmen who work together to give birth to Van Cleef & Arpels' wonders.
 
"This technique dates back to the 1930s. It was a real revolution at the time and there hasn't been a better technique invented since."
 
Discover more about the talent of a Mystery Set specialist at Van Cleef & Arpels, and listen to one of the Maison's craftsmen share this unique savoir-faire.
#VCAHighJewelry #VCAtogether #VCAsavoirfaire #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
Meet the Pastille bouquet clip (1951) on display at Florae Mika Ninagawa exhibition, in Paris. This clip illustrates the Maison’s technical artistry and the richness of its style. The five circular corollas, seemingly positioned at random, are made up of a round diamond surrounded by Mystery Set rubies.
 
#ExpoMikaFlorae #VCAflowers #VCAexhibition #VCAcollection #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
Van Cleef & Arpels welcomes you to the Florae Mika Ninagawa exhibition, from September 10 to November 14, 2021 at Hôtel d’Évreux, on Place Vendôme in Paris.

Discover Japanese artist @ninagawamika's brightly colored photographs, the floral creations of the Maison, and the immersive set immagined by architect @tsuyoshi_tane united in perfect harmony.

#VCAexpoFlorae #ExpoMikaFlorae #VCAflowers #VCAexhibition #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
Van Cleef & Arpels gave photographer @ninagawamika carte blanche to create an exhibition celebrating flowers, with her work presented alongside the Maison’s floral creations. 
 
To highlight the richness of this floral universe, Japanese architect @tsuyoshi_tane set up an immersive scenography based on two main concepts: the kaleidoscope and and the maze.
 
Dive into the Florae exhibition, from September 10 to November 14, 2021 at Hôtel d’Évreux, on Place Vendôme in Paris.
 
#ExpoMikaFlorae #VCAflowers #VCAexhibition #VanCleefArpels

Discover this Flower necklace with detachable clips, on display at the Florae Mika Ninagawa exhibition in Paris. This yellow gold Tubogaz chain adorned with five floral motifs, illustrates perfectly the Maison’s tradition of transformable jewelry. Its aesthetic design is reminiscent of the Passe-Partout jewel, on display at the Florae exhibition.

@ninagawamika @tsuyoshi_tane 
#ExpoMikaFlorae #VCAExpoFlorae #VCAflowers #VCAexhibition #VCAcollection  #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
Discover Rose de Noël clips, inspired by the Christmas rose, a flower which comes to life in the depths of winter.  Since the 1970s, these emblematic pieces of the Maison have featured petals of ornamental stones such as carnelian, or organic materials like white or gray mother-of-pearl.

To learn more about these creations, rendez-vous from September 10 to November 14, 2021 at Hôtel d’Évreux, on Place Vendôme in Paris for the Florae exhbition.

@ninagawamika @tsuyoshi_tane 
#ExpoMikaFlorae #VCAExpoFlorae #VCAflowers #VCAexhibition #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
Beginning in the 1910s, bouquets started to proliferate in Van Cleef & Arpels’ creations. Sprays of precious flowers seem to be freshly picked and bound with a golden ribbon. Set with colored stones or diamonds, these pieces enchant the eye with their volume and feeling of motion... Discover precious bouquets of the Maison at the Florae Mika Ninagawa exhibition in Paris, until November 14, 2021.

@ninagawamika @tsuyoshi_tane 
#ExpoMikaFlorae #VCAexpoFlorae #VCAflowers #VCAexhibition #VCAcollection #VanCleefArpels
